btnsettings.no_config_tips: The toggle button will not take effect if $$$$ client configuration is not added.
btnsettings.startup_tips: Note: After the device is rebooted, {func} will be enabled if the Toggle Button is on, otherwise it will be disabled.
btnsettings.auto_sync_tips: Is {func} enabled/disabled immediately depending on the state of the Toggle Button?
btnsettings.vpn_client_tips: You need to set the {vpn_type} configuration in {meunkey} for the toggle switch to work.
